Courtside.Description: Premier seating offering an unrivaled view and experience, directly adjacent to the court.
Courtside.View_Quality: Unmatched court-level view, offering an immersive and dynamic experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunities for interactions with players, high visibility on broadcasts.
Courtside.Accessibility: Convenient access with limited availability for personal mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive VIP areas, complimentary high-end dining options, and premium services.

Platinum Level.Description: Exclusive seats offering a superior view from the sides, enhanced by luxury amenities.
Platinum Level.View_Quality: Elevated views with a perfect line of sight to the action on the court.
Platinum Level.Unique_Features: Luxurious seating with extra comfort, less crowded for a more private experience.
Platinum Level.Accessibility: VIP entry and access to private elevators and restrooms.
Platinum Level.Special_Perks: Entry to platinum clubs, in-seat service, and exclusive dining options.

Terrace Level.Description: An affordable option providing a full view of the game from the upper levels.
Terrace Level.View_Quality: Broad view of the entire court, suitable for fans who enjoy an overview of the game.
Terrace Level.Unique_Features: Cost-effective choice for enjoying the game atmosphere without breaking the bank.
Terrace Level.Accessibility: Accessible seating options available, with elevators to the terrace level.
Terrace Level.Special_Perks: More budget-friendly, still offering access to amenities and the excitement of the game.

Flagship Level.Description: Combines the intimacy of courtside with the comfort of luxury suites, located just above the court level.
Flagship Level.View_Quality: Near-court perspective with elevated views for an unparalleled viewing experience.
Flagship Level.Unique_Features: Exclusive mix of privacy and proximity to the game, premium seating options.
Flagship Level.Accessibility: Easy access with premium amenities close by, including dedicated restroom facilities.
Flagship Level.Special_Perks: Access to private lounges and dining areas, with top-tier in-seat service.

restaurants_bars.name: Happiest Hour
restaurants_bars.description: Dallas' largest patio bar and lounge, featuring a rooftop deck with views of the Dallas skyline.

restaurants_bars.name: Shooters Dallas
restaurants_bars.description: A lively sports bar located within the American Airlines Center, offering classic American fare and a wide selection of beers.

restaurants_bars.name: The Owners Box
restaurants_bars.description: A sports-centric bar at the Omni Dallas Hotel, offering innovative cocktails, local craft beers, and an impressive LED screen.

restaurants_bars.name: Pecan Lodge
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for its Texas barbecue, Pecan Lodge offers a hearty dining experience with smoked meats and southern sides.

restaurants_bars.name: El Fenix
restaurants_bars.description: A landmark Mexican restaurant known for its Tex-Mex cuisine, offering a warm and festive atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: Medina Oven & Bar
restaurants_bars.description: Offers a cozy ambiance with Moroccan and Mediterranean cuisine, perfect for a more intimate dining experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Saint Ann Restaurant & Bar
restaurants_bars.description: Set in a renovated historic school, this restaurant and bar serves New American cuisine in a chic, garden setting.

accommodations.name: W Dallas - Victory
accommodations.description: Trendy hotel offering stylish rooms, a spa, and an infinity pool, located just steps from the American Airlines Center.

accommodations.name: Omni Dallas Hotel
accommodations.description: Luxury hotel with a full-service spa, rooftop pool, and multiple dining options, offering views of the Dallas skyline.

accommodations.name: Fairmont Dallas
accommodations.description: Elegant accommodations in the Arts District, featuring a rooftop pool and fine dining, within a short drive from the arena.

accommodations.name: Hotel Crescent Court
accommodations.description: Upscale hotel offering refined rooms and suites, a luxury spa, and a variety of dining options in Uptown Dallas.

accommodations.name: The Joule
accommodations.description: A revitalized 1920s neo-Gothic landmark building transformed into a luxurious boutique hotel, featuring unique art installations and a rooftop pool.

accommodations.name: Aloft Dallas Downtown
accommodations.description: Contemporary hotel with loft-inspired rooms and a vibrant social scene, located near the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center.

tourist_attractions.name: Perot Museum of Nature and Science
tourist_attractions.description: A world of wonder, with five floors of interactive exhibits, an IMAX theater, and a children's museum.

tourist_attractions.name: Dallas World Aquarium
tourist_attractions.description: An aquatic wonderland housing a vast array of marine life, from sharks to jellyfish, in a rainforest setting.

tourist_attractions.name: Klyde Warren Park
tourist_attractions.description: A vibrant green space over the Woodall Rodgers Freeway, featuring food trucks, a butterfly garden, and plenty of outdoor activities.

tourist_attractions.name: Dallas Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: One of the largest art museums in America, offering a vast collection spanning 5,000 years of history.

tourist_attractions.name: The Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza
tourist_attractions.description: A museum dedicated to presenting the life, death, and legacy of President John F. Kennedy at the historic site of his assassination.

tourist_attractions.name: Reunion Tower
tourist_attractions.description: An iconic 561-foot observation tower offering panoramic views of Dallas, along with dining and entertainment.

team_related_activities.name: Mavs Fan Shop
team_related_activities.description: Official store for Dallas Mavericks merchandise, located within the American Airlines Center.

team_related_activities.name: Mavs Gaming Hub
team_related_activities.description: Experience the thrill of eSports at the Mavs Gaming Hub, where fans can watch live NBA 2K League games and engage in various gaming activities.

team_related_activities.name: Mavs Practice Facility Tours
team_related_activities.description: Take a behind-the-scenes tour of the Dallas Mavericks' state-of-the-art practice facility. Learn about the team's preparation routines and possibly catch a glimpse of your favorite players.

team_related_activities.name: Dallas Mavericks Bar Crawl
team_related_activities.description: Participate in a Mavericks-themed bar crawl event. Enjoy special promotions, meet fellow MFFLs (Mavs Fans For Life), and celebrate game days in a festive atmosphere across various bars in Dallas.

options.description: Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) offers extensive light rail and bus service throughout Dallas, including direct access to the American Airlines Center via Victory Station on the Green and Orange lines, ensuring convenient access from various parts of the city and suburbs.

The M-Line Trolley provides free, eco-friendly rides connecting the Uptown neighborhood with downtown Dallas. It's a charming way to reach the vicinity of the American Airlines Center, with stops conveniently located for fans to enjoy nearby dining and entertainment before and after the game.
For fans coming from Fort Worth or the mid-cities, the TRE offers commuter rail service to Victory Station on game days, allowing for a stress-free journey to and from Mavericks games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary and most reliable source for all Mavericks ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the widest selection of seating options.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: As the official ticketing partner for the Dallas Mavericks, Ticketmaster provides a secure and straightforward platform for purchasing authentic tickets, including exclusive presales for fans.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A trusted secondary marketplace for fans to buy or sell Mavericks tickets. StubHub verifies all tickets for authenticity, ensuring a safe transaction and peace of mind.

best_places_to_buy.name: SeatGeek
best_places_to_buy.description: Another reliable secondary ticketing option that aggregates tickets from various sources, offering a comprehensive view of available seating and prices for Mavericks games.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
